publication.title: A simple, efficient method for realistic animation of clouds
publication.keyword: Atmospheric Effects;Fast Imaging;Graphics Hardware;Volume Rendering;Cellular Automaton;
publication.abstract: This paper proposes a simple and computationally inexpensive method for animation of clouds. The cloud evolution is simulated using cellular automaton that simplifies the dynamics of cloud formation.
